FuncDef: This command specifies the IPv6 DNS servers to include in the RDNSS option in Router Advertisements. When specified at the router advertisement level this applies to all interfaces that haveinclude-dnsenabled, unless the interfaces have more specificdns-optionsconfigured.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IPv6 address of the DNS server(s), up to 4 max. Specified as eight 16-bit hexadecimal pieces.
